alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 20 at 2:33PM PDT until April 22 at 12:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THURSDAY TO NOON PDT FRIDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches for pass routes and 8+ inches for the high elevations. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of eastern and northeast Nevada. * WHEN...From 5 PM Thursday to noon PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County
